courses.advice_detail_en: Perfect temperature for running. You can slightly increase your usual pace. Light breeze with little impact on running. The surface is wet, and some sections may be slippery. Slightly lower your pace and take extra care on downhills and corners. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
